trans-unit.source: E3Reader - for getting data from the Heartland End-to-End Encryption
trans-unit.target: E3Reader-para obtener datos del Heartland End-to-End Encryption

trans-unit.source: PosGateway - for talking to the HPS Exchange PosGateway and sending E3
trans-unit.target: PosGateway-por hablar con el HPS Exchange PosGateway y enviar el E3

trans-unit.source: Python modules for working with Heartland Payment Systems (HPS) via their SOAP interface.
trans-unit.target: Módulos Python para trabajar con Heartland Payment Systems (HPS)a través de su interfaz SOAP.

trans-unit.source: work with Heartland credit card readers and service
trans-unit.target: trabajar con los lectores de tarjetas de crédito de Heartland y el servicio
